ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Fifteen: normaltimes; I'm J.B. Space
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 18:39:08. [CVDB24631] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 23:15:44. [Issue ID 39028]
ComicInfo.Writer: William Messner-Loebs,Randy Zimmerman,Bill Bryan,Bill Messner-Loebs,William Messner-Loebs,Randy Zimmerman,Bill Bryan
ComicInfo.Penciller: William Messner-Loebs,Randy Zimmerman,Bill Bryan,Bill Messner-Loebs,William Messner-Loebs,Randy Zimmerman,Bill Bryan
ComicInfo.Inker: William Messner-Loebs,Randy Zimmerman,Bill Bryan,Bill Messner-Loebs,William Messner-Loebs,Randy Zimmerman,Bill Bryan
ComicInfo.Letterer: Jim Osten,Randy Zimmerman,Bill Bryan,Bill Messner-Loebs,Jim Osten,Randy Zimmerman,Bill Bryan
ComicInfo.Summary:
Wolverine meets Native American Ojibwa and recounts an encounter with the temporally displaced normalman.
Jemmy Acorn finds a capsule with a comic strip depicting J.B. Space's space trucking exploits.
Wolverine and Jemmy wake after a storm to meet the Tin Man from Oz.
